creator: webmaster@buession.com
text:
Created attachment 32004
The screenshot of error

I have two url http://0871y.com/order/188_order_2.php and http://www.0871y.com/order/188_order_2.php.

Their configuration is the same.

Configuration：
<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerName www.0871y.com
    ServerAlias 0871y.com
    DocumentRoot "/var/htdocs/0871y.com"
    AddDefaultCharset UTF-8

    <IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
        RewriteEngine On

    </IfModule>

    CustomLog "/var/log/apache/0871y.com/access.log" combined
    ErrorLog "/var/log/apache/0871y.com/error.log"
</VirtualHost>

http://0871y.com/order/188_order_2.php to request access to normal; but http://www.0871y.com/order/188_order_2.php request access is not normal, HTTP status is Aborted.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not for support. I'd suggest engaging users@httpd.apache.org for some basic troubleshooting and return here if you think you've found a bug in httpd.

creator: webmaster@buession.com
text:
This is a BUG.
The screenshot above and description, only used to describe my configuration and bugs.

creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
text:
Accessing to http://www.0871y.com/order/ and http://0871y.com/order/ give the list of the files in these directories.

Other php files I've opened from there work with both URL (with www. and without)
The only one that seems to give a different result is 188_order_2.php, as you described.

This looks like an issue within your php file not a bug in the web server.
I test is OK with other machines.Only the machine has this bug, even if the PHP file is blank.
creator: webmaster@buession.com
